lead_paragraph: On the Ground REBEL RETREAT -- Northern Alliance troops retreated shortly after launching a misbegotten attack against a stubborn Taliban stronghold near the city of Maidan Shar, 12 miles west of Kabul. A1 BATTLE FOR KUNDUZ -- Fierce fighting broke out between Taliban and Northern Alliance troops outside Kunduz, where thousands of Taliban troops and foreign soldiers were trapped. A senior alliance leader said Taliban officials had agreed to surrender the city, but the deal seemed fraught with questions. B1
